name: barry-traffic-intelligence
description: BARRY - Real-time Traffic Intelligence Platform for Go North East

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../Go_BARRY && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd Go_BARRY && npm install && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy:render: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to Render' && git push origin main

author: Anthony Gair
